newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 32.468 (32.378).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 32.468 (32.378).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 32.468 to the dollar after Friday's fixing at 32.378 and at 19.771 to the mark from 19.809.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT) and is within plus/minus 7.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at 11:30:00 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of -0.26 percent, unchanged from Friday.
At the time of the calculation, the crown traded on the interbank market at -0.07 versus the basket. -- Bratislava Newsroom, 42-7-210-3687
